item.title: Inside the Multimillion-Dollar Gray Market for Video Game Cheats
item.description: Gaming cheats are the bane of the video game industry—and a hot commodity. A recent study found that cheat creators are making a fortune from gamers looking to gain a quick edge.

item.title: No, of Course You Can't Actually Play the New Lego Game Boy
item.description: A promo video of the new brick-built Nintendo collaboration has some people confused as to what your $60 will buy you.

item.title: Italian YouTuber Faces Jail Time for Showing Android Handhelds With Emulated Games
item.description: The games on the devices shown by the content creator may not be entirely legal. That was enough for Italian law enforcement to ding him for “promotion of pirated copyrighted materials.”
